Package component.base

Class BasicStoryComponent

java.lang.Object
component.base.BasicStoryComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Savable, SavableAsJSONObject<BasicStoryComponent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlankBasicStoryComponent, Chapter, EventCard, Storyline
public abstract class BasicStoryComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements SavableAsJSONObject<BasicStoryComponent>
Base class of story components.
See Also:
EventCard, Storyline, Chapter

      componentID - this component's unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • JSONObjectToBasicStoryComponent

      public static BasicStoryComponent JSONObjectToBasicStoryComponent​(java.lang.String componentID, org.json.simple.JSONObject componentObject)
      Converts JSONObject to a BasicStoryComponent of the correct type, with a componentID specified by componentID parameter. Used to populate HashMap during file open.
      Parameters:
      componentID - ID of th component to be created.
      componentObject - JSONObject to be converted into component.
      Returns:
      A BasicStoryComponent of the correct type.
